pr_title: Fix JWT revocation not working with APIM 3.1.0

timeline.message:
Fix not persisting APIM 3.1.0 jwt revocation data.

* Add checks for the revoked jwt payload parameters.
* Remove blacklist word.
Add jwt signature to the revoked jwt map when using AM 3.1.0
Simplify the signature or JTI check.

timeline.author: praminda

replies.bodyText: The message is not displaying if we pass the exception
replies.author: menakaj

timeline.message:
Pass original exception to the CLIInternalException.

Co-authored-by: Praminda <pramindabj@gmail.com>
